message.content:
I need to identify the specific line item and value that represents the costs of general management and administration of the entity as a whole.

In an income statement, administrative expenses typically represent the costs associated with general management and administration of the company. 

Looking at the provided income statement, I can see the line item "Administrative Expenses" with a value of 16809.11 on 2024-02-01.

This is the value that represents the costs of general management and administration of the entity.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '16809.11'} }
```
